Sure, here are 30 viral inspirational and motivational tips:

1. Choose your attitude and focus on positivity.
2. Take small steps each day towards your goals.
3. Believe in yourself and your abilities.
4. Find a mentor or role model to inspire you.
5. Be persistent and never give up on your dreams.
6. Surround yourself with positive, supportive people.
7. Visualize your success and see yourself achieving your goals.
8. Take care of your physical and mental health.
9. Learn from failures and use them to grow and improve.
10. Prioritize your time and focus on what matters most.
11. Keep a gratitude journal to cultivate a positive mindset.
12. Embrace challenges as opportunities for growth.
13. Stay organized and focused on your goals.
14. Celebrate your progress and accomplishments.
15. Learn new skills and expand your knowledge.
16. Be adaptable and open to change.
17. Take calculated risks to achieve your goals.
18. Use affirmations to reinforce positive beliefs.
19. Set boundaries to protect your time and energy.
20. Practice self-care and prioritize your well-being.
21. Stay curious and continue to learn and grow.
22. Step outside of your comfort zone and try new things.
23. Take breaks to recharge and avoid burnout.
24. Practice mindfulness and stay present in the moment.
25. Stay positive and optimistic, even in difficult times.
26. Avoid comparing yourself to others and focus on your own journey.
27. Seek out inspiration and motivation from various sources.
28. Focus on progress, not perfection.
29. Give back to your community and make a positive impact.
30. Never stop striving for excellence and personal growth.
